articles.title: E3 2023: Dates and Details Announced - IGN - IGN
articles.description: E3 2023 has announced the dates of its return, with separate days (and halls) for press and public.

E3 2023 has announced the dates of its return, June 13-16 with separate days (and halls) for press and public.
